name: Dreadshot
storyline: Delta Inc. is creating its own metaverse game, codename "Project Elisium", which is designed to replace the oppressive reality of humanity with countless virtual worlds, and thus enslave the mind of all mankind for the sake of gaining computing power. You play as an assassin, a professional agent codenamed Dreadshot, and your goal is to prevent the company from releasing the game... Or to help?
summary: Dreadshot is a fast and dynamic first-person shooter with parkour elements. The gameplay wants to combine all the best mechanics of modern shooters into a cohesive whole, аnd the plot is a deep satire on the current state of the gaming industry.
